description: Imports a CSV file and converts to a datatable.

input.name: files list
input.description: A file containing a .csv or .tsv formatted data.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
The character encoding of the input `file`.
Defaults to `utf8`.

input.name: separator
input.description: Character used as column delimiter. Leave blank to auto-detect from a list of most common delimiters. Defaults to "," (blank).

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
